website_summaries.verdict: The Salomon Sense Mantra 2 is reshaped to be a better training shoe for runners. It is a minimalist running shoe designed for trail running that offers glove-like fit and impressive ground contact. Though the shoe has minor issues, users still found the Sense Mantra 2 a dependable trail partner.
pros: Many noticed the impressive ground contact the shoe can offer
Many liked the quick lacing system, allowing runners to tie laces efficiently
The shoe has excellent support features and enough cushioning for trail running
According to a few users, the shoe feels light and fast
cons: Some runners mentioned that they developed blisters
Some think that the Sense Mantra 2 was poorly designed

customer_reviews.title: The sole is the best part of these shoes -- it provides great grip ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a road runner who needed trail shoes for a Ragnar trail race. The sole is the best part of these shoes -- it provides great grip on even the loosest trail (of which I had plenty!). The shoe is also really comfortable, though it fits large. I am a size 7.5 for regular shoes and 8 for running shoes. I bought these 7.5 and wish I had bought them size 7. Nonetheless, these still worked great even if a tad big. Amazon's price is also amazing! They were being sold on site at the race for $110!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were very comfortable out of the box and fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these on a whim after another Salomon trail shoe purchase. I followed the reviews but only ordered a 1/2 size down, not a full, because they didn't have anything smaller then 8. Shoes were very comfortable out of the box and fit perfect. The shoe lacing system is a little weird but you get used to it quickly. Very good arch support and nice toe box with no rubbing. Love them! Only flaw is the, otherwise it would get a five, is the slide clip broke second time wearing them. Contacted the seller and he's sending me new laces! Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: DocMcStuphen

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to be used for riding single-track on our fat-tired tandem. They work well for both on the bike and for the times I jog or walk off the bike when the trail is a bit too technical and/or steep for a tandem. I would normally buy a size 6 for running. Because of the reviews, I bought my street-size (5.5). They are still about a half size too big. If I were to buy these again, I would get a size 5.
customer_reviews.author: kado

customer_reviews.title: nice looking addition to my Salomon trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: I developed nerve damage in my foot after an arduous decent on a hike several months ago. Since then, I've been looking for a shoe that won't add to the pain. These work well. I got them in a 1/2 size larger than what I normally wear and while they are a little big in the toe box, it seems to give me the additional width which helps alleviate the pain for the most part. Comfy, nice looking addition to my Salomon trail shoe collection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-aholic

customer_reviews.title: Trail runners
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit a bit big (usually ordering 1/2 to 1 size up for my running shoes) but these I had to return & re-order for a smaller size. They are stiff and supportive, especially in the forefront. They take a while to break in, but they are great shoes. Glad I stuck with them!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to softball cleats!
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up for softball on our county's fields (they're in terrible condition) and I wanted something other than cleats (cleats in our outfield = broken ankles). I love, love the fit and feel of these shoes, but the pull tag for the laces is really hard to figure out (had to get someone else who owns the shoes to show me how to do it!) But the laces stay tight the entire time, and they're great for running the bases.
customer_reviews.author: near_starlet

customer_reviews.title: Great trail running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy light weight for a trail shoe. My husband is an trail ultra marathoner(any distance longer than 26.2 miles on the mountains) and these are his favorite! They do run a bit large. I went down a whole size to a size 7 and my feet are very wide.
customer_reviews.author: Dee M

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to Salomon shoes from a fitness expert. I absolutely love these shoes. I now have approximately 8 pairs. I love the vibrant colors they are available in. I did go an extra size up. I probably could have gone with my original size but I do not like my shoes tight. They fit perfectly and have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these. I love the low-rise of the heel & the shoes are sturdy but comfy. Have worn them everywhere & on all terrains. Wish the new mantras didn't change styles so drastically, which is why I'm glad these are still available.
customer_reviews.author: LA Woman

customer_reviews.title: Not broken in yet - but so far seem pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use these for a run just yet. They are comfortable, but not as wide as my last pair of Salomon's similar style and not as much arch support - which I need. That is not unusual for any running shoe though I have found. I think the narrower fit may help support running/walking on uneven ground - which I need and is why I choose trail runners.
customer_reviews.author: Curl Girl - "C"

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for running and walking long distance
customer_reviews.text: These fit well to size. Design is not loud - pleasing to the eye. Very comfortable for running and walking long distance. I've already had them over a year at the time of writing this review. I don't wear them everyday so I expect will last a number of years before needing to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Hil's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Not just a fancy shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I run three to four times a week (on pavement) on a good week and normally my toes rub the shoes causing me a great deal of discomfort after my runs. With these shoes, I don't have that problem. They air out very well and don't have shoe strings to fuss over. Just pull the draw string and tuck it in a nifty little pocket in the tongue of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Forwardess

customer_reviews.title: Not much cushion, not my fave
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite salomans. This is my 3rd pair and least fave. It doesn't have much cushion so my feet got a bit bruised on some of my rockier hikes. Also it cuts a bit strange across the top of my toes at the bend. Other Salomans don't seem to do this, even the same size shoe. I will probably only wear these if my others are wet.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes
customer_reviews.text: You probably want to order a full size down from your typical running shoes. I usually wear an 8 or 8.5 in trainers, but I needed to order a 7 in these and they fit. I have very narrow feet and need to cinch the laces tight and on the 2nd time I wore them I already broke the plastic lace system. I like the shoes, but I need to order new laces. Don't pull them too tight!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: ... now have 2 pairs of Salomon's and I just LOVE their shoes
customer_reviews.text: I now have 2 pairs of Salomon's and I just LOVE their shoes. My husband and I recommend them to everyone and so far, everyone who has listened to us is happy. These shoes are comfortable, great for all day wear, and are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs Whittemore

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy full size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Stiff as review stated. Just what I need. Ordered 1/2 size smaller because I like room. But they are stil same size. Definitely get full size smaller. I'll just continue to wear 2pairs socks. Will always be faithful to salomon. Best around
customer_reviews.author: PtoVal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the best shoe if you require ankle support but worked very well through my trail runs.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Hundley

customer_reviews.title: Great Trail Running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Update: Great shoes for trail run, great fit and comfort after 10k Running. ------- The only issue was that we ask for the normal size I use and I think I needed 0.5 less size.
customer_reviews.author: Vctor Hugo

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this shoe. I have another pair of Salomon's and love them but his pair seems of less quality and fits poorly. I cannot wear them for long without wishing I could take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Salomon is my love mark regarding to tennis shoes. This model is incredibly comfy, light and modern. More than happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever! Love them! I've purchased them twice and will again! They're comfortable, durable, and great for running and everyday use! Can't recommend them enough!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Salomon Women's Sense Mantra Hiking/Running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to Costa Rica in December, and touring Arenal which has the volcanos and hiking trials etc...was recommend to get shoes that have traction on the bottom and also ones that will dry fast (due to the humidity). Out of all hiking shoes I looked at - I felt that the Salomon's are the best ones. Plus I liked this color combo (they have other ones as well). They have great support and feel breathable. My friend who got another pair now even said she wants to return them and get these now. I did have to go down half a size, but then again I do have very narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: peribay

customer_reviews.title: What I love about Salomon's is they always allow your toes to ...
customer_reviews.text: What I love about Salomon's is they always allow your toes to have plenty of freedom. This is a nice summer trail walking or running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Randyw

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the look and feel of most Salomon shoes so ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the look and feel of most Salomon shoes so I continue to order them but I dislike the inconsistencies with the size for women. I need room in my shoes so I typically need an half size bigger to include orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: veronica looney

customer_reviews.title: ... worried that running my first ocr would be so bad in the wrong shoes
customer_reviews.text: I did my first Spartan race in these and I was so worried that running my first ocr would be so bad in the wrong shoes. The reviews helped so much because they fit perfect. I had no issues running in them up hill and down hill. They were so comfortable to be in running that obstacle course.
customer_reviews.author: E Mal

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy but with a great deal of support
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy but with a great deal of support. I haven't worn any of my other shoes since I got these.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Very comfortable, easy to break in. Great for walking around a lot, not so much for standing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica and Larry

customer_reviews.title: Fine shoe, not as slip-on as I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I **LLOOVVEE** the ties that are not shoestring ties. BUT, they are not weaved into the tongue of the upper, so it bunches when I put the shoes on. OY! Can't get everything I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Irene DE

customer_reviews.title: I normally buy a 1/2 size larger than my casual ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy a 1/2 size larger than my casual shoes but that wasn't necessary for this shoe. Rather than return them, I will wear a thicker sock.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: one of the best trail/hiking shoes ever made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. She loves them. There well made and very comfortable once broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Norman A. Llanes jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of heel support, the clips on ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of heel support, the clips on the laces are hard to use, and the and the insoles slide around. Seems durable though.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: They are still too wide but reasonably comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I already have downsized to 9 1/2. They are still too wide but reasonably comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: B Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe. Decent colors
customer_reviews.text: Have worn them to work for 8-10 hrs/day for the past 4 shifts. No pressure points or blisters! Toebox provides plenty of room for toes to spread out. Prob could have sized down 1/2 a size but hard to say...as sizing down may have created pressure points. Nice shoe. Decent colors.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes but had to return them because they were a little too big. So Sad!
customer_reviews.author: NTK

customer_reviews.title: ... replace my old pair of Salomon shoes and I like them even more than my old pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old pair of Salomon shoes and I like them even more than my old pair.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Aksland

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for trails!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I highly recommend them to everyone who does trail / gravel runs!!
customer_reviews.author: BioStudent

customer_reviews.title: Runs big, order a size to a size and a half smaller if you order them at all.
customer_reviews.text: WAY TO BIG. I ordered a 8 1/2, I swear these were a 10 or 11! I gave them to a friend who wears a 10, and they were too big for her!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Run big, but still comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 and bought size 7. I could have easily fit into a 6.5. I bought them for obstacle races, so I guess 2 pair of socks will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Holmes

customer_reviews.title: the shoes feel like paddles on my feet
customer_reviews.text: The soles are too stiff, the shoes feel like paddles on my feet. My feet feel trapped like they want to get out. Unfortunately I wore them outside to find this out, so I can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: Nila Norvell

customer_reviews.title: ... got a size smaller than normal and they fit great.
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said these shoes ran small so I got a size smaller than normal and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Peggie L

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is completely off.
customer_reviews.text: Followed other reviewers advice on sizing and they were too small. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Good support and the pull tie shot laces are convenient
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Shoes Too Big
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer size 6 1/2 and return the size 7. I wore the size 7 for a few days and size 7 is too large.. 2 out of 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: "sure footed"
customer_reviews.text: I added superfeet half size plastic arch supports and they worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sense Mantra 2 is true to it's usual size. ...
customer_reviews.text: Sense Mantra 2 is true to it's usual size. The Mantra 3 fits smaller than the 2 - so I'm back to the Mantra 2.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe but run really large
customer_reviews.text: I always have size 9.5 in all running shoes Salomon run super large. A size 8 fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anke Cosich

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Very comfortable. Shoe has good arch support and laces keep feet firmly in place. Dry and cool. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful, but the toe room is a bit large, I would recommend 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: MARISOL AGUILAR RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!!! run a 100k trail race and they responded perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: amy martelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, stupid lacing system
customer_reviews.text: Bought to wear walking the dogs. The tread is definitely there, and makes a lot of noise on sidewalks! Comfortable shoe for my use. Giving it just 4 stars though, because the lacing system is stupid and not smooth to use, and the holes are too small to replace with regular laces.
customer_reviews.author: nano-nadoo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not the best shoes for running
customer_reviews.text: I find it bothers my toes a lot if I go for a run longer than 15 miles. Been getting bruised toes from the box area. I have purchased them a half size bigger, but still having problems. I will definitely keep them for hiking and trail exploring, but I don't think I would wear them for running anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi H.

customer_reviews.title: but great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: shoelaces are a bit strange, but great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for men
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review of the men's mantra 2 on Amazon saying how the men's sizes don't really translate well from European to US sizing and because the women's are basically 1/3 sizes instead of half sizes the women's mantra 2 fits me better than the mens.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: weird fit, no arch
customer_reviews.text: Weird. I was under the impression from Salomon that they would fit like the speedcross 3. They don't. No arch support whatsoever. Run larger than speedcross 3 also, as if that's possible.
customer_reviews.author: WC

product_meta.title: Salomon Sense Mantra 2 Women's Trail Running Shoes, Grey, 6.5 UK
product_meta.description: Shoes Sense Mantra 2 W Softy Blue/Gy/Cld
feature_bullets: Sense Mantra 2 W Trail Running SS14
